title: The Crepe Cart
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, American, Fast food, Take-out, French, Fusion, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Little cart in the French Market that has 2 menus: regular and vegan. The vegan menu is gluten-free. Includes 3 savory (salsa, pesto and hummus) and about a dozen sweet (chocolate, plain, fruit, lemon, pb bananas, etc.) crepe options.
